### Tender Announcement: Advance Contract Award Notice
#### QUICK SUMMARY
* **Title**: Advanced Customer Care ACAN
* **Reference Number**: WS4690721526-Doc4692125309
* **Contract Number**: WS4690721526
* **Offer Closing Date**: August 7, 2024, at 14:00:00
* **Award Status**: Expired

### Tender Details
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) intends to enter into a contract for Advanced Customer Services (ACS) to support Phoenix production operations. PSPC requires Technical Account Manager (TAM) II resources to provide on-demand services to end-users in a range of areas, including software troubleshooting and issue resolution, advice on best practices and system processes, and ongoing education and training on the use of the Phoenix system.
The scope of work includes:
* Providing customer support services on an as-and-when-requested basis
* Resolving software and system issues in collaboration with end-users and IT support teams
* Offering expertise on system security, technical troubleshooting, and problem resolution
* Managing technical requirements to ensure smooth system operation

### Aims and Objectives
* Support high-volume production operations
* Reduce system downtime
* Enhance end-user knowledge on the Phoenix system
* Maintain overall system performance

### Applicable Trade Agreements
The proposed contract is subject to the Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), and other relevant agreements.

### Service Locations
This contract will provide nationwide service to support Phoenix production operations across Canada.

### Contact Information
For more information, reply to the solicitation at [most.gov/gc/commerce.html](http://most.gov/gc/commerce.html).
